  • Method Details

    • formatSeconds

      public static String formatSeconds(int seconds)
      This method formats seconds into a string in the format "m:ss" where m is minutes and ss is seconds.
      Parameters:
      seconds - the number of seconds to format.
      Returns:
      a string representation of the time in "m:ss" format.

    • selectRandomElement

      public static <T> T selectRandomElement(Set<T> set)
      This method selects a random element from a set.
      Parameters:
      set - the set to select from.
      Returns:
      the randomly selected element.
